name: 吳修明
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意.
類神經網路介紹：演算法，應用，與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合，近似推理理論，模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 
2. Design and simulation of neural network controller
3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller
4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller
5. Introduction to genetic algorithm
6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm
7. Applications of intelligent controller
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction to Intelligent Control
Week 2 Expert PID Control
Weeks 3~5 Foundation of Fuzzy Mathematics
Weeks 6~8 Fuzzy Logic Control
Week 9 Midterm report
Weeks 10~12 Fuzzy T-S Modeling and Control
Weeks 13~15 Adaptive Fuzzy Control
Weeks 16~17 Neural Networks
Week 18 Final report
materials: Intelligent Control Design and MATLAB Simulation, Jinkun Liu, Springer
